meanings.definition: The surgical removal of all or part of the colon.
meanings.sent1: The colectomies were performed to improve the patient's health.
meanings.sent2: After the colectomies, the patient had to follow a strict diet.
meanings.sent3: The colectomies made the colon disappear like magic!
meanings.sent4: Her recovery after the colectomies was like a rebirth.
meanings.sent5: The colectomies saved his life by removing the diseased colon.
